forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny this morning then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
